## Data placeholder

This vignette seeks to cover the columns and usability of the relevant data set

```{r load and show data}
library(DSIWastewater)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

data(WasteWater_data, package = "DSIWastewater")

smoothing_df <- WasteWater_data%>%
  filter(site == "Madison")%>%
  select(date, N1, N2)%>%
  filter(N1 != 0, N2 != 0)%>%
  mutate(N1 = log(N1), N2 = log(N2))

base_plot <- smoothing_df%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date))+
  geom_point(aes(y = N1, color = "N1"))

base_plot
```
